sentence: …``are especially severe for the North Slope. Oil and gas development in  the NPR-A funds the Borough's schools, emergency services, and  infrastructure. It supports jobs for Inupiaq shareholders and  residents. It underwrites the continuation of our communities, even as  we maintain our subsistence way of life. By arbitrarily locking away  vast portions…

…Hon. Nicholas Begich III,      U.S. House of Representatives, Washington, DC.

Dear Senators Murkowski, Sullivan, and Representative       Begich: On behalf of the North Slope Inupiaq leadership--      including Arctic Slope Regional Corporation (ASRC), the North       Slope Borough (Borough), and the Inupiat Community of the       Arctic Slope (ICAS)--we…
